description:
"In 1995 I had 7 bucks in my pocket and knew two things, I was broke as hell and 1 day I won't be" - Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson

The Forex market is the largest worldwide market with over 5 trillion dollars traded each day, that is more than enough reasons why you should, take this course.

******Limited time offer take this course at $99, before the price is back at $200******

  • Be your own boss, this course is for anyone who is interested in making money online whether from home or from work.
  • If your tired of getting up to work for someone else, then take this course
  • Learn a method of reading the market that less than 1% of traders know
  • 5 Star rated, a community of over 1000 students
  • When you buy this course you will also get access to 4 Step System ebook one of the best selling Forex ebooks on Amazon valued at $13.49 completely free!

This course is made up of 10 video lectures and 5 pdf lectures divided over 3 sections. In section 1 you will learn about the Forex market and terminologies, you will learn about support and resistance, candlesticks and RSI divergence. In section 2 you will learn what is supply and demand how to recognized signs of supply/demand on charts and you will learn different market entry techniques. You will also learn where to place stops and when to take profit.

In section 3 you will learn the 4 step confirmation technique and how to use this technique to make money. You will see examples of trades I have taken in the past , you will see my entry, my take profit and you will see how much money I make on each trade; you will see proof that its possible to make $3000 or more in a day trading Forex. This course is not a get rich quick course, however this is a course that will equip you with the knowledge to make a comfortable living online trading Forex.

This course can be completed in 1 or 2 days
title: Making A Living Online Trading Forex
